text: @FibeIndia  Your agents are threatening to visit my office and harassing me despite my financial crisis and willingness to settle. This violates RBI guidelines. Please resolve this immediately.  #CustomerRights   #RBIGuidelines   #RespectDignity   #earlysalary   #fibe

Hello Arbaaz ,

Thank you for reaching out to us. We have forwarded your concern to the respective team to get this investigated and will get back to you shortly with an update over email. Also, we request you to stay responsive to the follow-up calls.

Best,
Team Fibe.

My Client regardless of telling yours  @FibeIndia   @earlysalar53892  Agent Sneha along with 2 other who claims to be a collection agents from FIBE has been calling and messaging continuously even after my client has explained his situation which amounts to harassment.

Hello Lawyerpanel757,

Thank you for writing to us. We request you to kindly communicate the registered loan account holder to write to us at needhelp@fibe.in from the registered email ID. We will definitely check and assist the customer with necessary support.

Best,
Team Fibe.
